example.text: And so , after all that , which you might justly consider paranoia , my question is basically this ; in light of the threat of peak oil , and of the general decline in American economic might relative the rest of the world -LRB- not to mention the current U.S. crisis -RRB- , what do think the world will look like in a decade or two ?
